channel.title: How to make a custom item that you don't wear or fight with
channel.description: I'm trying to make a new item using the model: 6467 to make a thing you can "snuff" (lmao) i would like to afect your stats meaning putting them down temporarily like "beer" does how do i make a item like this because i looked through my class 8 and all i found were custom items you could wear/wield. Please help! :eek:

item.title: How to make a custom item that you don't wear or fight with
item.dc:creator: @twister25 twister25
item.description:
@twister25 wrote:

thanks a lot! It should work and I’ll test it now =)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2008, 10:13:31 AM[/size][hr]actually it is a tree so…is there like a model list i could look at somewhere?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a custom item that you don't wear or fight with

item.title: How to make a custom item that you don't wear or fight with
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

ok if it looks like ash add this to your class8

    if(i == ITEMID)
    {
    class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
    class8.aStringArray189[0] = "Snuff";
        class8.anInt174 = 6467;
        class8.anInt190 = 264;
        class8.anInt181 = 1210;
        class8.anInt198 = 1892;
        class8.anInt204 = 0;
        class8.anInt165 = -1;
        class8.anInt200 = -1;
        class8.anInt169 = -6;
        class8.anInt194 = 0;
        class8.anInt188 = -1;
        class8.anInt164 = -1;
        class8.anInt175 = -1;
        class8.anInt197 = -1;
        class8.aString170 = "YOUR ITEM NAME";
        class8.aByteArray178 = "YOUR ITEM DESCRIPTION".getBytes();
    }

That ash code with the model changed so add it and let me know how it looks. if it doesn’t look right send me a copy of the model and i will make it look as close to right as i can get it

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a custom item that you don't wear or fight with
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

do you have the Item added to your client yet???

And do you know what the model looks like (does it look kinda like ash)??? if it looks like ash i can help you out in like 10 min if not then it will take a little longer

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a custom item that you don't wear or fight with

item.title: How to make a custom item that you don't wear or fight with
item.dc:creator: @twister25 twister25
item.description:
@twister25 wrote:

[quote=“Hackerz, post:3, topic:221157”]So you want it were the item in stead of saying wear or wield and doing that you want it to be able to be used like a book is
Read
Use
Drop

if so then change this
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”; The 1 stands for the item should be worn or equipped

To

class8.aStringArray189[0] = “Snuff”; The 0 stands for it is to be used not equipped[/quote]

oh thanks that helped but im still kinda confused like how to i actually make it?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a custom item that you don't wear or fight with

item.title: How to make a custom item that you don't wear or fight with

item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

So you want it were the item in stead of saying wear or wield and doing that you want it to be able to be used like a book is
Read
Use
Drop

if so then change this
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”; The 1 stands for the item should be worn or equipped

To

class8.aStringArray189[0] = “Snuff”; The 0 stands for it is to be used not equipped

item.title: How to make a custom item that you don't wear or fight with
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

I’m not sure how to make it so your stats will temporarily go down although you will need to add it in:

public void buryItem

to make it disappear and not wield.
